questions.question: Thinking that he .......................................... someone with similar interests, the traveler tried to strike up a conversation with the scholar he met at the inn.

If you allow me to speak the truth I will say without any hesitation that you have ......................................... a mistake.
She is so rich that she ............................................... two private yachts and three jets.
He asked me if I ............................................. feeling well and I replied that I wasnâ€™t.
